title: We are looking for a support
body:
Hello summoners my team is looking for a support that want to join my team.Its a team ranked 5v5 and sometimes 3v3 we just want to have fun.
If you are a support main or want to play support in our team just say it in this post and we will probably take you.It would be nice if you could be be silver because we are all silver players (noobs).Seeya in my team :P.

replies.body: Your on the OCE boards with this Why exactly?
